UserUIPreference.name: UserUIPreference
UserUIPreference.description: Represents user preferences for Salesforce components.

Name.description: The system-generated number for the user preferences. Read-only.

ObjectScope.description: The API name of the object that the preference applies to. For example, the preference applies to the Quote object.

SourceScope.description: Specifies the component, feature, or product that the preference is for. For example, a preference for column widths that's associated with the Transaction Line Table component in Revenue Cloud.

UserId.description: The user associated with the user preferences.

Value.description: The JSON for the user's preferences.
